long_description: The REI Auto-Open 46 Anodized Umbrella provides a single-person refuge from the rain. It features a 46 in. canopy and unique red anodized aluminum shaft and ribs. Automatic open and manual close. Easy-grip, rubber-coated handle helps you keep a solid grasp. Closed length is 12 in.; Weighs 10.5 oz.
short_description: The REI Auto-Open 46 Anodized Umbrella provides a single-person refuge from the rain. It features a 46 in. canopy and unique red anodized aluminum shaft and ribs.
